org.mxupdate.update.datamodel
Class Policy_mxJPO.Access

java.lang.Object
  org.mxupdate.update.datamodel.Policy_mxJPO.Access
Direct Known Subclasses:
Policy_mxJPO.State
Enclosing class:
Policy_mxJPO
public static class Policy_mxJPO.Access
extends Object

Access definition for owner / public definitions (depending on one state or for all states).

Field Summary

          Set holding the complete owner access.

          Sorted set of user access (by name of the user).

parse

protected boolean parse(String _url,
                        String _content)
Parses given access _url.

Parameters:
_url - access URL to parse
_content - content of the access URL
Returns:
true if _url could be parsed; otherwise false

prepare

protected void prepare()
The user access are sorted.

See Also:

writeObject

protected void writeObject(Appendable _out)
                    throws IOException
Writes specific information about this state to the given writer instance.
  • owner access
  • owner revoke
  • public access
  • public revoke
  • user access

Parameters:
_out - writer instance
Throws:
IOException - if the TCL update code could not be written

calcDelta

protected void calcDelta(Appendable _out,
                         Policy_mxJPO.Access _oldAccess)
                  throws IOException
Calculates the delta between this new target access definition and current definition _oldAccess within MX. The MQL statements to change are written to _out.

Parameters:
_out - writer instance
_oldAccess - current access definition
Throws:
IOException - if write failed
